name: Mick Jagger Gardening Simulator
description:
An entry for #bitsyjam July 2019 on the theme of "moss". Use the arrow keys to navigate.

I am not in the slightest bit sorry.

Made with Bitsy by Adam Le Doux, with many hacks from the Bitsy Hecks Repo. Music was created with BeepBox, and added using the Add Bitsy Audio tool by candle.
